Let us meet again Mata aimashou
There are a lot of colorful houses, are not there?
Burano Island back on Manhome was also a fishing village, just like this one.
It is said that the fishermen's wives painted the houses in various colors...
It seems that tradition is still alive and well here today.
This is the Venetian lace that was popular in Manhome's Venice, is not it?
Yes.
Nets are necessary to fish, right?
So lace was developed from the art of weaving nets.
It looks like the art of lace-making has been passed down to Aqua, has not it?
I am sure the bride who wears that dress will look stunning.
The woman we are going to visit now, Anna, was also very beautiful in her lace wedding dress.
Really?
Um, so what kind of person is Anna?
Let us see...
She was a cheerful and glamorous Undine.
She had many male fans, and was much busier than I am now.
Wow!
She sounds amazing!
It makes me kind of nervous.
My, my.
In That Gently Passing Time...
It is this house, Alicia.
Hello!
Huh...
Maybe she is not home?
I am pretty sure this is the time we agreed on, but...
Huh?
Huh?
Huh?
Hello!
Wha?
Please wait!
There is something I would like to ask you!
That boy...
What is the matter?
There were two ladies at our gate.
YOU-Umm...
That uniform...
Anna.
Long time no see, Alicia.
Then, you must be...
Ah, yes.
Pleased to meet you!
I am Akari Mizunashi.
Hello, Akari.
I am Anna.
And this is my son, Ahito.
Hello, Ahito.
H-Hello.
Oh?
What is this, Ahito?
You are blushing.
I am not blushing!
My, my.
Are you flustered?
Shut up, hag!
Whaaat?!
Stop it!
My, my.
Such beautiful lace work.
It is wonderful!
Grandma made it.
Huh?
Your grandmother?
Yeah.
My grandma is a famous lace maker on this island.
Mom's getting lessons from her right now.
She is still bad at it, though.
Hey!
That was given to me as a wedding gift.
Everything else is either my own work, or was given to me by someone else.
Back when Anna was working at the Aria Company...
She soon fell in love with that kind fisherman who cared so much about his mother.
Thank you so much for forgiving my selfishness.
Not at all, Anna.
Congratulations.
This is a wonderful reason.
To see you follow your own path without any hesitation makes me very happy.
Thank you very much, Grandma.
Please take care.
Thank you, Alicia.
Take care of yourself.
I will.
The Aria Company was the high point of my youth.
It is pudgy-wudgy!
It was a happy marriage, was not it?
Not exactly.
I am joking.
But there were hardships.
Getting married and moving was fine, but life here was completely different from my life as an Undine.
I did not know anyone.
My husband was always out fishing.
I became alienated from the islanders, so I had a hard time getting to know them.
It was really lonely.
But after I started learning how to make lace, I gradually got to know the islanders.
In some cases, we had up to five people working on a single lace project.
Five people?
Each of these lace embroideries was done by a different person,
and they entrusted me with making the bridge embroideries that connect each section.
I was so happy.
That embroidery became the real bridge that connected you and the islanders, did not it?
Yeah.
Whoa, great way to put it, Akari!
Ah!
I am sorry.
My, my.
I wonder if Grandma is doing well.
Ah, sounds like Alberto's back from fishing.
Grandma!
What are you doing here?
Alicia invited me.
Long time no see, Anna.
I am glad to see you are doing well.
We just happened to bump into each other.
I am so happy to see you, Grandma!
My, my, President Aria.
Hello, Ahito.
Hello.
Nice to meet you.
I am Alberto.
I am Akari Mizunashi.
How was it?
Oh, it was a great haul!
Ta-da!
I picked out the ones that looked especially tasty!
Looks delicious.
All right.
Time to put my cooking skills into action!
It smells delicious.
Looks like it is cooked just right.
Here I go!
All right!
Are you okay?
Alberto!
Dinner's ready!
Okay!
We will be right there!
Ow...
This looks amazing!
Okay, let us dig in!
Let us eat!
Let us eat!
It is delicious!
The fish is so fresh, it is delicious!
Why, thank you.
Here, Grandma.
Thank you.
Yummy!
Yummy!
This is fantastic!
Looks like he is tired.
He woke up early today, did not he?
He just got carried away, that is all.
There is a lot of Aria Company history that I do not know, is not there?
From the founding of the Aria Company, to Akari, our newest member...
Somehow, it all makes me really happy.
I think of Ahito as a grandson, as well.
Spending this moment together is like a miracle.
That is right.
A miracle...
It is all thanks to you for founding the Aria Company, Grandma.
If you had not, Alberto and I would have never met,
and Ahito would not have been born into this world.
I see you have your feet firmly on the ground, and cherish every day.
You have found a happiness that suits you, have not you?
Thank you very much.
I did not found the Aria Company on my own.
It was President Aria who gave me the idea.
No, it was more like he saved me.
President Aria did?
Would you mind telling us about that?
Back then, I was at a loss with myself.
It was back when I was still an Undine at Himeya.
Good work, Akino.
Good work, Akino!
Good work, Akino!
Good work.
By that time, I had already been known as Himeya's ace Undine for over fourteen years.
Akino looks wonderful today, as always.
She changes the mood simply by passing by, does not she?
I heard she had six bookings back to back yesterday.
That is amazing!
If it were me, I would definitely be worn out.
Instead of waning, she seems to shine brighter and brighter with age, does not she?
And no matter how busy she is, she always has a smile on her face.
She truly is the greatest Water Fairy of our time!
Thank you very much.
Bye bye!
Ah, that sure was fun.
Bye bye.
Huh?
Hello, Mr. Cat.
You always seem to be here, lately.
Where did you come from?
What are you doing here every day?
Are you lost, by chance?
Do not you get tired of always being in the same spot?
I am sorry.
It would be hard to answer so many questions all at once.
At the time, I enjoyed my work, of course,
but I was so busy that time seemed to just fly by.
Every so often, I would think to myself, What a waste.
There are so many wonderful things in this world.
If only I could take the time to cherish each and every one of them.
Say, Mr. Cat.
What are you always looking at from here?
Are you waiting for something that is important to you?
A white seabird with a tilted neck...
Kubi o kashigeta shiroi umidori
Soon, a ship sailing beyond the sky...
Sora no mukou no fune ga mousugu
Mr. Cat!

And that is how it all began.
Akari.
Yes?
Someday, your Aria Company will begin.
We are all looking forward to your Aria Company, which will be unlike anything we have seen before.
Good luck!
Yes, I will do my best!
My, my.
Ai, I am so happy I was allowed to be a part of the Aria Company.
Because of that, I am able to spend time with such wonderful people.
Akari, the Aria Company is an amazing place...
I am kind of envious!
